title: Organic Pesticides | From the Ground Up

tasks.task: Addressing questions about organic pesticides at the Extension office.
subtasks: Discussing the effectiveness and availability of organic pesticides.
Informing about certified organic pesticide options.
Emphasizing the importance of using personal protective equipment (PPE).
Listing necessary PPE items (long sleeve shirt, long pants, shoes, socks, chemical resistant gloves).
Stressing the need for proper label reading and understanding safe usage.
Acknowledging limitations in organic product availability.
Encouraging creative problem-solving for effective pest control.
Reminding users to treat organic products as chemicals despite their label.

tasks.task: Providing advice on pesticide use and safety.
subtasks: Warning about potential harm to beneficial insects (pollinators).
